title: Rush
overview: Rush sees twelve everyday Aussies, deprived of sight and sound, dropped into the chaotic heart of the biggest and most famous cultural festivals, events and locations around the world. Contestants are competing in challenges and resisting eliminations to reach the end and win the big prize. Dropped into the heart of some of the most pulsating cultural festivals, huge events and exotic locations in Brazil, Turkey, Jordan, India, Thailand, Ireland, France, Kenya and South Africa, deprived of all senses they must work together to complete the mission and reach the Escape Zone.
